attributes.action: Void Chris Packhams petition which obtained signatures through false information
attributes.background: Chris Packhams petition for a moratorium on wading birds obtained 1000's of extra signatures through lying about specific birds being shot of which are protected in the UK. I am calling for this petition to be void.

rejection.details: We only reject petitions if they don't meet the rules for petitions. We're not responsible for what people say when promoting their petition, including on social media.
